pages.text: Poole travels the world, healing and helping all those who encounter it. A pool full of healing water sits inside the ship, along with a few palm trees to form a calming oasis.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/energy_gain)$(l)Healing Burst/$$(br)The water in the oasis swirls around, $(l)restoring 3 Energy/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)no Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_start)$(l)Energized Water/$$(br)The healing aura around Poole provides you with $(l)4 extra Energy/$ when $(l)the game starts/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
